title: Clinical Decision Support & Ambient AI Scribe
summary: An AI-powered clinical documentation system that passively listens to patient-provider conversations and generates structured clinical notes in real-time, reducing physician documentation burden by 70%.
description:
An AI-powered clinical documentation system that passively listens to patient-provider conversations and generates structured clinical notes in real-time, reducing physician documentation burden by 70%.

## Technical Architecture Components

- Medical-grade LLM (Large Language Model) fine-tuned on clinical data
- Ambient listening hardware (directional microphones)
- Speech recognition engine (medical terminology optimized)
- Natural Language Processing (NLP) pipeline
- Clinical knowledge graph (drug interactions, guidelines)
- FHIR-compliant data exchange layer

## Implementation Timeline

**Day 1:**
- Hardware installation and EMR plugin deployment

**Day 3:**
- Provider voice calibration

**Day 7:**
- Weekly accuracy audit

**Day 14:**
- Full deployment with live CDS

## Case Study Reference

**Internal Medicine Practice, Chicago**

- **Challenge:** 2+ hours daily documentation after clinic
- **Outcome:** 70% reduction in charting time, 3 additional patients/day
